author: Associated Press
title: Asian Americans use social media to drown out bigotry
description: From #WashTheHate to #RacismIsAVirus to #IAmNotCOVID19, Asian Americans are mobilizing on social.
content: Kyle Navarro was kneeling down to unlock his bicycle when he noticed an older white man staring at him. Navarro, a school nurse in San Francisco, already had anxiety about racism related to the coronavirus, which emerged in China and has Asian people facing u… [+5782 chars]
